episode_event_sv_nemo/4001_1001_0100_10: Come on, let’s battle already! Who’s next?
episode_event_sv_nemo/4001_1001_0200_10:
N-not us! You’re too strong! We wouldn’t be any
match for you!
episode_event_sv_nemo/4001_1001_0400_10: I heard there was someone high-spirited around!
episode_event_sv_nemo/4001_1001_0500_10:
(This person is different from the other Trainers
I’ve battled so far...)
episode_event_sv_nemo/4001_1001_1000_10: I, Bede, will be your challenger!
episode_event_sv_nemo/4001_1001_1300_10: We’ll take turns, OK? Me first, then you.
episode_event_sv_nemo/4001_1001_1400_10:
Excuse me—you don’t get to decide everything.
I saw her first.
episode_event_sv_nemo/4001_1001_1500_10:
Wait, does that mean we’re gonna have a
three-way battle? That sounds fun!
episode_event_sv_nemo/4001_1001_1700_10: Well, I’ve no problem with that!
episode_event_sv_nemo/6001_1031_0100_10:
There are loads of
strong Trainers!
episode_event_sv_nemo/6001_1001_0100_10:
Pasio’s amazing! So many people I could have a
serious battle with!
episode_event_sv_nemo/6001_1001_0200_10: I... This is just the best!
episode_event_sv_nemo/4002_1001_0200_10:
I haven’t seen her around. Maybe she only recently
arrived on Pasio.
episode_event_sv_nemo/4002_1001_0300_10: She seems to really love Pokémon battles...
episode_event_sv_nemo/4002_1001_0400_10: Reminds me of a few people I know.
episode_event_sv_nemo/4002_1001_0500_10:
This is legit incredible! You guys are both
so strong!
episode_event_sv_nemo/4002_1001_0700_10:
I was chosen as a Neo Champion of Pasio, so I
am the most elite of all.
episode_event_sv_nemo/4002_1001_0900_10: It’s a special title you can earn on Pasio!
episode_event_sv_nemo/4002_1001_1000_10:
The idea was to find folks other than Champions
who could be role models for others to measure
up against.
episode_event_sv_nemo/4002_1001_1100_10:
So if you enter certain tournaments and are
judged worthy...
episode_event_sv_nemo/4002_1001_1200_10: you’re given the title of Neo Champion!
episode_event_sv_nemo/4002_1001_1400_10:
Also, there’s nothing that says only one person can
earn the title.
episode_event_sv_nemo/4002_1001_1600_10:
That sounds kinda like the Pokémon League
in Paldea.
episode_event_sv_nemo/4002_1001_1800_10:
Well, in it, if you pass a special test called the
Champion Assessment...
episode_event_sv_nemo/4002_1001_1900_10:
you’re awarded the qualification of
“Champion Rank”!
episode_event_sv_nemo/4002_1001_2000_10: In fact, I reached Champion Rank myself!
episode_event_sv_nemo/4002_1001_2200_10:
Well then, you’re very lucky to have met an elite
like me so soon after arriving on Pasio.
episode_event_sv_nemo/4002_1001_2300_10:
If you’re a Champion, you must have struggled to
find an opponent who’s your equal.
episode_event_sv_nemo/4002_1001_2600_10:
But I did find someone! Someone I can battle on
equal ground with...
episode_event_sv_nemo/4002_1001_2700_10: And they’re a precious treasure to me!
episode_event_sv_nemo/4002_1001_2900_10:
Isn’t it great to have someone you can go all-out
against?
episode_event_sv_nemo/4002_1001_3100_10:
So tell me—there are other strong Trainers on
Pasio, right?
episode_event_sv_nemo/4002_1001_3200_10:
Yeah. They’re not as good as me, but there are
quite a few that have some skill.
episode_event_sv_nemo/4002_1001_3400_10:
Battling solo can be nice, but here on Pasio, it’s
standard to battle in teams of three.
episode_event_sv_nemo/4002_1001_3600_10: A team?! Oh, of course! Sure am!
episode_event_sv_nemo/4002_1001_3700_10: Blue! Bede! Please team up with me!
episode_event_sv_nemo/4002_1001_3800_10: Hate to break it to ya, but I can’t.
episode_event_sv_nemo/4002_1001_4000_10: I know who I’d like you to battle.
episode_event_sv_nemo/4002_1001_4100_10: But for that to happen, I can’t be on your team.
episode_event_sv_nemo/4002_1001_4300_10:
Heh, I’ll be looking forward to when we
battle again!
episode_event_sv_nemo/4002_1001_4500_10: Wh— Don’t look at me like that!
episode_event_sv_nemo/4002_1001_4800_10: As I said, I have other things to—
episode_event_sv_nemo/4002_1001_4900_10:
Aw, seriously? You’re a Champion like me, right?
Let’s battle against even stronger opponents!
episode_event_sv_nemo/4002_1001_5000_10: C’mon! Let’s team up! Pretty please?!
episode_event_sv_nemo/4002_1001_5100_10: Listen to what I’m saying! My answer is no!
episode_event_sv_nemo/4002_1001_5200_10:
Besides, I have yet to deem you worthy of the
title of Champion—
episode_event_sv_nemo/4002_1001_5300_10:
I’m not gonna fold until you say yes! I want you to
team up with me!
episode_event_sv_nemo/4002_1001_5400_10:
What a hassle... Fine, then! I guess I have
no choice.
episode_event_sv_nemo/4002_1001_5500_10: Yay! That’s what I’m talking about!
episode_event_sv_nemo/4002_1001_5700_10:
*sigh*
If you’re teaming up with me, know that I won’t
accept defeat.
episode_event_sv_nemo/4002_1001_5800_10: We need one more person for our team, but...
episode_event_sv_nemo/4002_1001_6100_10:
My name’s Cheren. I’m a teacher at the Trainers’
School in Unova.
episode_event_sv_nemo/4002_1001_6200_10:
A teacher?! This is the first time I’ve met one
outside of the academy!
episode_event_sv_nemo/4002_1001_6300_10:
I know a Trainer who loves battling that I think
you’ll get along with.
episode_event_sv_nemo/4002_1001_6400_10: How about teaming up with her?
episode_event_sv_nemo/4003_1001_0100_10: Let me introduce you to Hilda.
episode_event_sv_nemo/4003_1001_0200_10:
I think you’re both probably around the same level
when it comes to—
episode_event_sv_nemo/4003_1001_0300_10: Enough chitchat. Let’s get to the battle!
episode_event_sv_nemo/4003_1001_0400_10:
Yeah! Battling’s the best way to get to know each
other, right?
episode_event_sv_nemo/4003_1001_0700_10:
I’m so glad I found someone I don’t have to hold
back against!
episode_event_sv_nemo/4003_1001_0800_10:
Me too! It’s been a while since I’ve gotten so into
a battle!
episode_event_sv_nemo/4003_1001_1000_10:
They had such a flashy battle, they’re starting to
draw a crowd...
episode_event_sv_nemo/4003_1001_1200_10:
Must be nice. If I were good at Pokémon battling,
I could fun like that...
episode_event_sv_nemo/4003_1001_1300_10: But there’s no way we can get THAT strong...
episode_event_sv_nemo/4003_1001_1500_10: You don’t have to be strong to enjoy battling!
episode_event_sv_nemo/4003_1001_1600_10:
The most important thing is to go all-out and give
your opponent all you’ve got!
episode_event_sv_nemo/4003_1001_1700_10:
Exactly! No one starts out strong! We get stronger
one step at a time!
episode_event_sv_nemo/4003_1001_1800_10: Take the battle seriously, and give it your all!
episode_event_sv_nemo/4003_1001_1900_10: That’s the best way to enjoy a Pokémon battle!
episode_event_sv_nemo/4003_1001_2200_10: When you say it like that...
episode_event_sv_nemo/4003_1001_2300_10: I feel like I can do it!
episode_event_sv_nemo/4003_1001_2400_10: Great! Now let’s all battle together!
episode_event_sv_nemo/4003_1001_2700_10: Of course! No need to ask!
episode_event_sv_nemo/4003_1001_2800_10: Yay! We have three people now, Bede!
episode_event_sv_nemo/4003_1001_3000_10: All right! Let’s battle with all our might!
episode_event_sv_nemo/4003_1001_3300_10: Nice teamwork, all three of you!
episode_event_sv_nemo/4003_1001_3400_10: They might be a better team than I thought.
episode_event_sv_nemo/4003_1001_3500_10:
So this is a three-on-three battle... It’s so
much fun!
episode_event_sv_nemo/4003_1001_3600_10: Right? Makes you want to battle even more!
episode_event_sv_nemo/4003_1001_3800_10:
My, my... I think my days are going to be busy
for a while...
episode_event_sv_nemo/4004_1001_0100_10: Lear wants to talk to us? About what?
episode_event_sv_nemo/4004_1001_0300_10: Who’s Lear? Does everyone know him?
episode_event_sv_nemo/4004_1001_0400_10:
He’s the successor to the royal family that
owns Pasio.
episode_event_sv_nemo/4004_1001_0500_10:
What?! Someone that important wants
to talk to us?!
episode_event_sv_nemo/4004_1001_0600_10: Have we been battling too much or something?
episode_event_sv_nemo/4004_1001_0700_10:
We did go around battling sync pairs all over
the island.
episode_event_sv_nemo/4004_1001_0800_10: Don’t worry. That’s not what I’m here to discuss!
episode_event_sv_nemo/4004_1001_1200_10: I heard about you from Blue.
episode_event_sv_nemo/4004_1001_1300_10:
He said you’re a very strong Trainer who recently
showed up.
episode_event_sv_nemo/4004_1001_1400_10:
I welcome all strong Trainers to Pasio! And, at
Blue’s suggestion...
episode_event_sv_nemo/4004_1001_1500_10: We’ve decided to hold a tournament for you all!
episode_event_sv_nemo/4004_1001_1700_10:
I want you to liven up Pasio by battling on a
grand stage against the strongest opponents!
episode_event_sv_nemo/4004_1001_1800_10: Of course—count me in! I’ll join no matter what!
episode_event_sv_nemo/4004_1001_1900_10: Hah. So eager and energetic, just as I heard.
episode_event_sv_nemo/4004_1001_2100_10: Why don’t we join, too, Cheren?
episode_event_sv_nemo/4004_1001_2200_10: I was thinking the same thing.
episode_event_sv_nemo/4004_1001_2300_10: I’m so hyped! We definitely have to win!
episode_event_sv_nemo/4004_1001_2400_10: Of course. If we’re entering, we have to.
episode_event_sv_nemo/4004_1001_2500_10: I wonder what kind of Trainers we’ll face...
episode_event_sv_nemo/4005_1101_0100_20: On the day of the tournament...
episode_event_sv_nemo/4005_1001_0200_10: It’s finally started! Our first opponents are...
episode_event_sv_nemo/4005_1001_0300_10:
We joined to learn about Pokémon battling on
Pasio, but...
episode_event_sv_nemo/4005_1001_0400_10:
Are we really gonna battle with this huge crowd
watching?!
episode_event_sv_nemo/4005_1001_0600_10: They don’t look like they’ve been onstage before.
episode_event_sv_nemo/4005_1001_0700_10:
It’s more exciting when we don’t know what our
opponents can do!
episode_event_sv_nemo/4005_1001_0800_10: I wonder how strong they are... I wanna find out!
episode_event_sv_nemo/4005_1001_0900_10: Um, well then... Let’s have a good battle!
episode_event_sv_nemo/4006_1001_0100_10: Sorry, everyone. I invited you, and we lost...
episode_event_sv_nemo/4006_1001_0200_10: Tsk... I need to up my game.
episode_event_sv_nemo/4006_1001_0300_10: We couldn’t help it. Their team was strong.
episode_event_sv_nemo/4006_1001_0400_10: But everything’s OK because we had fun, right?
episode_event_sv_nemo/4006_1001_0600_10: Both of you had some fairly good attacks there.
episode_event_sv_nemo/4007_1001_0100_10:
If we win the next match, we’ll be in the finals!
Our opponents are...
episode_event_sv_nemo/4007_1001_0200_10: As I expected, you made it.
episode_event_sv_nemo/4007_1001_0300_10:
I’ve been looking forward to this! We’re your next
opponents!
episode_event_sv_nemo/4007_1001_0400_10: What?! The organizer can battle, too?
episode_event_sv_nemo/4007_1001_0500_10:
Oh, yeah. That would be surprising to you,
wouldn’t it.
episode_event_sv_nemo/4007_1001_0600_10: We’re used to it by now.
episode_event_sv_nemo/4007_1001_0700_10:
Hahahaha! This is how I do things! Sorry, but
you’re not making it to the finals!
episode_event_sv_nemo/4007_1001_0800_10:
If you have a problem with that, just try and
beat me!
episode_event_sv_nemo/4007_1001_1000_10: we’re gonna win! We can’t lose!
episode_event_sv_nemo/4007_1001_1200_10: Well then! Let’s see how long that confidence lasts!
episode_event_sv_nemo/4007_1001_1400_10: They’re good! Seems they’ve done their studying.
episode_event_sv_nemo/4007_1001_1600_10: Hah, fine! I’ll accept defeat this time!
episode_event_sv_nemo/4007_1001_1700_10: Yay! We made it to the finals! Let’s go for the win!
episode_event_sv_nemo/4007_1001_1800_10: (I see... She’s better than I heard.)
episode_event_sv_nemo/4007_1001_1900_10: (But don’t think you can win so easily on Pasio!)
episode_event_sv_nemo/4008_1001_0100_10:
Now it’s time for the finals! If we win this match,
we win it all!
episode_event_sv_nemo/4008_1001_0200_10:
You’ve teamed up with me, so there won’t be any
ifs. We WILL win.
episode_event_sv_nemo/4008_1001_0600_10: Are the two next to you...?
episode_event_sv_nemo/4008_1001_0700_10:
Yup! These are who I’d like you to battle with all
you’ve got!
episode_event_sv_nemo/4008_1001_0800_10: They’re strong opponents, fit for the finals!
episode_event_sv_nemo/4008_1001_1000_10: I can agree with that, Bede!
episode_event_sv_nemo/4008_1001_1100_10: Well, though imperfect, we are a team...
episode_event_sv_nemo/4008_1001_1200_10: Both our team and Blue’s will give it their all...
episode_event_sv_nemo/4008_1001_1300_10:
So let’s have ourselves an awesome,
fruitful battle!
episode_event_sv_nemo/4008_1001_1500_10:
That stung...but you’re not the only one who can
hit hard when it counts!
episode_event_sv_nemo/4008_1001_2200_10: Well, I think you did pretty well for yourself.
episode_event_sv_nemo/4008_1001_2400_10:
Ha haaa! Hahaha! That was, like, the best
match ever!
episode_event_sv_nemo/4008_1001_2800_10:
That’s the spirit! I’m liking you even
more, Nemona!
episode_event_sv_nemo/4009_1001_0100_10: We managed to win, but they were tough...
episode_event_sv_nemo/4009_1001_0200_10: Yeah. Looks like we need to get even stronger.
episode_event_sv_nemo/4010_1001_0100_10: This is the end of the tournament, and—
episode_event_sv_nemo/4010_1001_0300_10: Yeah! We have to win the next one!
episode_event_sv_nemo/4010_1001_0400_10: I can’t let it end this way, either!
episode_event_sv_nemo/4010_1001_0500_10:
Don’t you worry! I knew you were going to say
that, so...
episode_event_sv_nemo/4010_1001_0700_10:
Your next opponents will be the Champions of
each region!
episode_event_sv_nemo/4010_1001_0800_10:
I’m looking forward to seeing how far your skills
take you, Nemona!
episode_event_sv_nemo/4010_1001_1000_10:
Haha... What, does that give even YOU a
little pause?
episode_event_sv_nemo/4010_1001_1300_10: I’ve got so much excitement ahead!
